City Council

Schertz is governed by a council-manager form of government where the City Council sets city policy and the City Manager is responsible for city operations

Held every 1st and 3rd Tuesday of the month at 6:00 p.m.

City Council Workshop City Council Workshops will be held at the discretion of the Mayor and City Council and will take place prior to the regularly scheduled City Council meetings. Workshops are scheduled from 5:00 p.m. to 5:45 p.m., and the agenda will be posted at least three business days in advance.

City Council Chambers 1400 Schertz Parkway, Bldg 4 Schertz, TX 78154

Residents who choose to watch the meeting via live stream and would like to communicate with the City Council may email their comments to the City Secretary's Office at sedmondson@schertz.com before 5:00 p.m. on the Monday prior to the meeting. The City Secretary will provide copies to each Councilmember and the Mayor prior to the start of the meeting. In the body of the email, please include your name, address, phone number, agenda item number if applicable, or subject of discussion, and your comments. Please note your statement will not be read or made part of the official meeting record.
